arguments.description: The x coord of ellipse center.
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The y coord of ellipse center.
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: The radius of the ellipse along the x-axis (half the ellipse's width).
arguments.name: rx

arguments.description: The radius of the ellipse along the y-axis (half the ellipse's height).
arguments.name: ry

arguments.description: (false/nil) The ellipse will be filled, (true) The ellipse will have only lines (outline).
arguments.name: l

arguments.description: The color of the ellipse (0-15), defaults to the active color.
arguments.name: r

arguments.description: The number of the segments used when drawing the ellipse.
arguments.name: seg

note: The arguments can be passed in a table
shortDescription: Draws an ellipse on the screen.
